# JetSet Direct Link

The smart way to charter private jets, with smarter access to empty leg value.

JetSet Direct Link is a platform connecting savvy travelers with private aircraft charter operators for luxury travel at a fraction of the cost.

## Core Features
- **For Travelers**: Find and book "empty leg" flights (repositioning flights) at significantly reduced rates (often 50-75% off).
- **For Operators**: Monetize empty flights that would otherwise fly without passengers.
- **Route Alerts**: Users can set up alerts for specific routes to be notified when a matching empty leg becomes available.

## Key Pages
- Home: http://jetsetdeadlegs.com/
- How It Works: http://jetsetdeadlegs.com/how-it-works.html
- For Travelers: http://jetsetdeadlegs.com/for-travelers.html
- For Operators: http://jetsetdeadlegs.com/for-operators.html
- Blog: http://jetsetdeadlegs.com/blog.html
- Contact: http://jetsetdeadlegs.com/contact.html

## Mission
To democratize private aviation by making use of the 30-50% of private jets that fly empty, creating a win-win for operators and travelers.
